name: Plank
description:
Setup: Place forearms on the floor with elbows under shoulders and feet extended behind you. Brace your core and squeeze glutes to form a straight line from head to heels.
Execution: Hold the position while keeping ribs down and hips level. Breathe steadily and avoid sagging or piking.

name: Side Plank
description:
Setup: Lie on your side with forearm under shoulder and feet stacked (or staggered). Brace core and lift hips so body forms a straight line.
Execution: Hold with hips high and torso rigid. Breathe steadily and keep shoulders stacked over elbow.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
description:
Setup: Hang from a pull-up bar with arms straight and shoulders pulled down. Brace core and keep body still.
Execution: Raise knees toward chest by curling pelvis up. Pause briefly, then lower slowly without swinging.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
description:
Setup: Hang from a bar with shoulders down and core braced. Keep legs straight and minimize swinging.
Execution: Raise straight legs up toward waist/chest height (or higher), then lower slowly under control to a full hang.

name: Cable Crunch
description:
Setup: Attach a rope to a high cable and kneel facing the stack. Hold rope near sides of head and brace core with hips stacked over knees.
Execution: Crunch down by curling ribs toward pelvis (spine flexion), keeping hips mostly fixed. Squeeze abs, then return slowly to a stretched position.

name: Machine Crunch
description:
Setup: Adjust seat so torso and handles/pads fit snugly. Sit tall, brace core, and set range to a comfortable stretch.
Execution: Crunch forward by curling the torso, squeeze abs at peak, then return slowly under control without letting the stack slam.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
description:
Setup: Kneel on a pad and grip the ab wheel under shoulders. Brace core hard and squeeze glutes to prevent low-back arching.
Execution: Roll the wheel forward slowly until you reach a controllable stretch, then pull back to start by bracing abs and keeping hips from sagging.

name: Swiss Ball Crunch
description:
Setup: Sit on a stability ball and walk feet forward until lower back rests on the ball. Place hands behind head or crossed on chest.
Execution: Crunch up by curling ribs toward pelvis, pause/squeeze, then lower back over the ball for a controlled stretch.

name: Reverse Crunch
description:
Setup: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet off the floor. Brace core and press low back into the ground.
Execution: Curl pelvis up to bring knees toward chest, pause, then lower slowly until hips lightly touch down without arching the back.

name: Bicycle Crunch
description:
Setup: Lie on your back with hands behind head and knees up. Brace core and keep low back pressed into the floor.
Execution: Rotate torso to bring opposite elbow toward knee while extending the other leg. Alternate sides in a controlled, steady rhythm.

name: Russian Twist
description:
Setup: Sit with knees bent and lean back slightly with a tall chest. Hold a weight or keep hands clasped. Brace core.
Execution: Rotate shoulders side-to-side with control, keeping hips relatively still. Move through a comfortable range without rounding excessively.

name: Mountain Climbers
description:
Setup: Start in a high plank with hands under shoulders and core braced. Keep hips level.
Execution: Drive one knee toward chest, then switch legs quickly while maintaining a rigid torso and steady shoulder position.

name: Flutter Kicks
description:
Setup: Lie on your back with hands under hips or by your sides. Press low back into the floor and lift legs slightly.
Execution: Alternate small, controlled up-and-down kicks without letting the low back arch. Keep tension in the abs throughout.

name: V-Up
description:
Setup: Lie flat with arms overhead and legs straight. Brace core and keep low back controlled.
Execution: Raise arms and legs together to meet at the top, then lower slowly back to the floor with control.

name: Toe Touch Crunch
description:
Setup: Lie on your back with legs straight up toward the ceiling. Reach arms up and brace core.
Execution: Crunch upward to reach toward toes, squeeze abs, then lower shoulders back down under control.

name: Lying Leg Raise
description:
Setup: Lie on your back with legs straight and hands by sides or under hips. Brace core and press low back into the floor.
Execution: Raise legs up to a controlled height, then lower slowly until just above the floor without losing low-back contact.

name: Heel Taps
description:
Setup: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat. Slightly lift shoulders off the floor and brace core.
Execution: Reach side-to-side to tap each heel, keeping abs tight and ribs down. Move with control rather than momentum.

name: Pallof Press
description:
Setup: Set a cable/band at chest height. Stand sideways to the anchor with feet shoulder-width and hands at chest. Brace core and squeeze glutes.
Execution: Press hands straight out and hold, resisting rotation. Bring hands back to chest under control and repeat.

name: Cable Woodchopper
description:
Setup: Set a cable at high or low position. Stand sideways with feet shoulder-width, arms extended, and core braced.
Execution: Rotate torso to pull the handle across your body in a diagonal path. Control the return and avoid twisting through the knees.

name: Suitcase Carry
description:
Setup: Hold a heavy dumbbell or kettlebell in one hand at your side. Stand tall with shoulders level and core braced.
Execution: Walk slowly for distance/time without leaning to one side. Keep ribs down and torso upright, then switch hands.
